Hypenotic The Jekyll Butler

It’s the journey, damnit.

03 Nov 2012

Came across this, felt compelled to watch it. And I’m glad I did.
You won’t regret slowing down and watching it.

Will it fly? Does it matter? Those who believe it will enjoy how they feel for as long as they do.
I guess people who don’t dream in technicolor don’t know what they’re missing, but I can’t help feeling sorry for them.

I hope it reminds you that whatever you’re working on, the pain is a privilege too. And I hope it inspires you to keep on creating.

Everything is Incredible from Tyler Bastian on Vimeo.
